text: Nia bahihadu ala ne hagabudu go digau Levi hagaloohi i lodo di Hale Daumaha guu wanga gi Hilkiah, tagi aamua hai mee dabu. (Nia maa ne hagabudu mai i baahi nia daangada o Ephraim mo Manasseh mo nia daangada o Tenua Baahi Ngeia o Israel ala i golo, mo mai nia daangada o Judah, Benjamin mo Jerusalem.)
